skills.skill: Defensive Tactics (e.g., handcuffs, pepper spray, batons, Tasers, firearms) training
Mobility Devices (e.g., vehicles, bicycle, golf cart, Segway) training
Fire/Life Safety Services (e.g., emergency plans; occupants, floor wardens, and staff presentations; and evacuation drills)
Leadership training such as Supervisor Essentials and White Glove Customer Service
Instructor certifications in supplement training areas

duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct field training programs in accordance with local, state, and federal laws and regulations, as well as company standards.
Deliver CPR/First Aid/Automated External Defibrillator (AED) training
Conduct leadership training such as Supervisor Essentials and White Glove Customer Service

education_certification.credential: Instructor certifications in supplement training areas
